snippet.title: Life is Strange: Before the Storm - Farewell Launch Trailer [PEGI]
snippet.description:
Buy Farewell here: http://bit.ly/btsle

The bonus episode Farewell is out now! Upgrade to the Digital Deluxe edition and start playing now or get the boxed Limited Edition on Xbox One, PlayStation 4 and PC (Steam)!

The Limited Edition will appear in North American stores tomorrow, March 6 and on PAL-territory shelves on March 9. You can buy it here: http://bit.ly/btsle

Experience Max and Chloe’s childhood friendship in Farewell the bonus episode to Life is Strange Before the Storm. Ashly Burch and Hannah Telle reprise their roles in an emotional and nostalgic trip down memory lane.

Read more here: http://bit.ly/2FYAuG8

Follow us on:
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/LifeIsStrangeGame
Twitter: https://twitter.com/LifeIsStrange
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/lifeisstrangegame
Tumblr: http://lifeisstrange-blog.tumblr.com
VK: https://vk.com/lifeisstrange
Discord: http://discord.gg/lifeisstrange
